allow: Bash(if exist index.html ren index.html index-old.html)
Bash(del /f server.js server-auth.js server-supabase.js DEPLOY.md VERCEL-SETUP.md)

Bash(powershell -Command "Remove-Item ''D:\\Nova pasta\\membros-igreja\\server.js'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if \(Test-Path ''D:\\Nova pasta\\membros-igreja\\server.js''\) { Write-Output ''FAILED: server.js'' } else { Write-Output ''OK: server.js'' }")

Bash(powershell -Command "Remove-Item ''D:\\Nova pasta\\membros-igreja\\server-auth.js'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if \(Test-Path ''D:\\Nova pasta\\membros-igreja\\server-auth.js''\) { Write-Output ''FAILED: server-auth.js'' } else { Write-Output ''OK: server-auth.js'' }")
